DOC.brief_summary: This multiple site , proof concept feasibility study describe effect GTx-024 9 18 mg physical function female subject , protocol G200802 , ER+/AR+ breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Add-on Study Protocol G200802 ( NCT02463032 ) : Effect GTx-024 Maximal Neuromuscular Function Lean Body Mass
DOC.criteria: 1 . In screen , ultimately randomize , protocol G200802 2 . Give voluntary , write sign , inform consent addon study 3 . Age 18 70 year old 4 . Physically capable mount rid stationary bicycle 5 . Subject agree significantly alter physical activity current physical training study period 1 . Subject concomitant medical condition precludes adequate study treatment compliance assessment , increase subject risk , opinion Investigator 2 . Subjects unwilling unable comply protocol 3 . Any condition per investigator ' judgement may increase subject risk
